attributes.action: limit the amount of money sent out of the UK by Immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: may thousands of Immigrants come to the UK every year and send the majority of their income out of the uk. This has a damaging effect on UK based business and our ecconomy as a whole. I would like to see the amount of money that is allowed to be sent out of the UK limited by the govenment. This may even help the immigration problem we are experiencing.
